post.body: Sorry to hear yer back is buggin' ya. That makes for a rough time. :-(
lol...i bet you did!
That's the plan. Meeting P-dogg for lunch, then hauling 455 for the day.
Funny you should ask; they don't give those here.
Drive safe, slick.
I start Monday, believe it or not. Right outta one and into another. :-)
Yes, Masta Playa
ROFL
that's tougher. it's hard to find one that is inexpensive, but one you won't outgrow too fast. Fender and Ibanez make dec. ones.
Jump in then. :-) You can learn your first song in a few weeks if you try. Seriously. After the first one, it gets easier. IMO
Looked up wake up call chords. If you just want to strum/pick and sing, it's pretty simple. 3 chords and not too bad.
I don't know how to play Wake Up Call, so couldn't say on that one
Depends on the song. You could learn Rock you like a hurricane in an afternoon if you wanted, or Metal Health in about the same.
that's tough to say. The original had two guitars in it. I fyou play just the rythym parts, not too long.
Break a leg, man!
oooh...I am so going to get a set of that for Kaylee!
Possible. Play hockey, talk diff from others, use the 'u' in words. Born in NY; switched in the hosp? Sure would splain alot.
Tru dat! :-)
I use 'Colour', 'flavour', 'behaviour' all the time. Most ppl give me a hard time about it. Just born in the wrong place. :-)
I remember having one of those at Blackbaud..*shivers* Used to keep a pillow under my desk; no joke.
*Yawn* that's enough for me, tweeps! G'night!
Hockey done. Had a good game. What a diff sharp skates make!
Too groggy to play so stopped for 5 hr energy shot...ftw
Heading out for pickup. Looking forward to this, although I am a little sleepy tonight.
I ended up with a DiMarzio soundhole pickup for the baby since I'll need it to play out. Tested it tonight, and it really works well.
Excited that there is pickup hockey tonight. w00t!
OMG is my new Taylor a nice guitar! Not as nice as the Larrivee, but darn sweet. I can't begin to tell you how great it sounds for the price
Why I hate the fact everything has remotes: It is hot in my LR but the blasted remote for the ceiling fan is MIA.
Ooh...new graphic nvl for Batman. Frank Miller and Jim Lee. resisting urge..hint to @karintha88
ho-hum...sitting with nothing to do today.
Headed to final day t ths job
Aight den, I am outta here...night, tweeps
got tons of guitar practice done tonight as well as replicate my testing environment from home. Think it's time for bed! :-)
Home from the gym. What a great workout! The new approach is going to be fantastic.
At the gym for my appointment. :-)
Listening to live ver. of the Jack on If You Want Blood. Forgot how excellent it is!
Hyeading to lunch w/ P-Dogg
Ok, gave up trying to learn Java and Selenium at the same time. Now working in VS Express until I get Selenium understood.
Have an appt with trainer today to shakeup w/o routine. Current one no longer producing results. Excited about this.
Here at work, we spell our main application name as "Theater" rather than "Theatre". That really bugs me for some reason.
